trans-unit.source: fetch: This element controls how rows from a result set will be returned. Legal values include PDO::FETCH_ASSOC, PDO::FETCH_BOTH, PDO::FETCH_OBJ, PDO::FETCH_NUM, or a string representing the name of a class. If a string is specified, each record will be fetched into a new object of that class. The behavior of all other values is defined by PDO. See http://php.net/manual/pdostatement.fetch.php
trans-unit.target: fetch：此元素控制如何返回结果集中的行。合法值包括PDO :: FETCH_ASSOC，PDO :: FETCH_BOTH，PDO :: FETCH_OBJ，PDO :: FETCH_NUM或代表类名称的字符串。如果指定了字符串，则每个记录将被提取到该类的新对象中。所有其他值的行为由PDO定义。参见http://php.net/manual/pdostatement.fetch.php

trans-unit.source: files: An optional array defining include files that need to be loaded for building the form. Each array entry may be the path to a file or another array containing values for the parameters 'type', 'module' and 'name' as needed by module_load_include(). The files listed here are automatically loaded by \Drupal::formBuilder()->getCache(). By default the current menu router item's 'file' definition is added, if any. Use self::loadInclude() to add include files from a form constructor.
trans-unit.target: files：一个可选的数组，用于定义包含文件以构建表单所需的包含文件。每个数组条目可以是文件的路径，也可以是包含module_load_include（）所需的参数'type'，'module'和'name'的值的另一个数组的路径。此处列出的文件由\ Drupal :: formBuilder（）-> getCache（）自动加载。默认情况下，添加当前菜单路由器项的“文件”定义（如果有）。使用self :: loadInclude（）从表单构造函数添加包含文件。

trans-unit.source: finished: Name of an implementation of callback_batch_finished(). This is executed after the batch has completed. This should be used to perform any result massaging that may be needed, and possibly save data in $_SESSION for display after final page redirection.
trans-unit.target: 完成：callback_batch_finished（）的实现的名称。批处理完成后执行。这应该用于执行可能需要的任何结果按摩，并可能将数据保存在$ _SESSION中，以便在最终页面重定向后显示。

trans-unit.source: form: An associative array where the keys are the names of the different form operations (such as 'create', 'edit', or 'delete') and the values are the names of the handler classes for those operations. The classes must implement \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityFormInterface.

trans-unit.source: int $min_wordsafe_length: If $wordsafe is TRUE, the minimum acceptable length for truncation (before adding an ellipsis, if $add_ellipsis is TRUE). Has no effect if $wordsafe is FALSE. This can be used to prevent having a very short resulting string that will not be understandable. For instance, if you are truncating the string "See myverylongurlexample.com for more information" to a word-safe return length of 20, the only available word boundary within 20 characters is after the word "See", which wouldn't leave a very informative string. If you had set $min_wordsafe_length to 10, though, the function would realise that "See" alone is too short, and would then just truncate ignoring word boundaries, giving you "See myverylongurl..." (assuming you had set $add_ellipses to TRUE).
trans-unit.target: int $ min_wordsafe_length：如果$ wordsafe为TRUE，则截断的最小可接受长度（在添加省略号之前，如果$ add_ellipsis为TRUE）。如果$ wordsafe为FALSE，则无效。这可以用来防止产生非常短的字符串，这是无法理解的。例如，如果您将字符串“ See myverylongurlexample.com截短”以截断单词安全的返回长度20，则20个字符内唯一可用的单词边界在单词“ See”之后，这不会留下非常有用的字符串。但是，如果您将$ min_wordsafe_length设置为10，则该函数将意识到仅“ See”太短，然后将截断以忽略单词边界，为您提供“ See myverylongurl ...”（假设您已将$ add_ellipses设置为真正）。

trans-unit.source: langcode: (optional) The language code of a specific translation of the node, if any. Modules may add this key to grant different access to different translations of a node, such that (e.g.) a particular group is granted access to edit the Catalan version of the node, but not the Hungarian version. If no value is provided, the langcode is set automatically from the $node parameter and the node's original language (if specified) is used as a fallback. Only specify multiple grant records with different languages for a node if the site has those languages configured.
trans-unit.target: langcode：（可选）节点的特定翻译的语言代码（如果有）。模块可以添加该密钥以授予对节点的不同翻译的不同访问权限，以使得（例如）特定组被授予访问权限以编辑该节点的加泰罗尼亚语版本，而不是匈牙利语版本。如果未提供任何值，则将通过$ node参数自动设置语言代码，并将节点的原始语言（如果指定）用作后备。如果站点配置了这些语言，则仅为节点指定多个使用不同语言的授权记录。

trans-unit.source: needs-data: The type of data that must be provided to \Drupal\Core\Utility\Token::replace() in the $data argument (i.e., the key name in $data) in order for tokens of this type to be used in the $text being processed. For instance, if the token needs a node object, 'needs-data' should be 'node', and to use this token in \Drupal\Core\Utility\Token::replace(), the caller needs to supply a node object as $data['node']. Some token data can also be supplied indirectly; for instance, a node object in $data supplies a user object (the author of the node), allowing user tokens to be used when only a node data object is supplied.
trans-unit.target: needs-data：必须在$ data参数（即$ data中的键名）中提供给\ Drupal \ Core \ Utility \ Token :: replace（）的数据类型，以使该类型的令牌成为在正在处理的$ text中使用。例如，如果令牌需要一个节点对象，则“ needs-data”应为“ node”，并且要在\ Drupal \ Core \ Utility \ Token :: replace（）中使用此令牌，调用者需要提供一个节点对象作为$ data ['node']。某些令牌数据也可以间接提供。例如，$ data中的节点对象提供了一个用户对象（节点的作者），当仅提供节点数据对象时，允许使用用户令牌。

trans-unit.source: set_active_class: (optional) Whether each link should compare the route_name + route_parameters or href (path), language and query options to the current URL, to determine whether the link is "active". If so, an "active" class will be applied to the list item containing the link, as well as the link itself. It is important to use this sparingly since it is usually unnecessary and requires extra processing. For anonymous users, the "active" class will be calculated on the server, because most sites serve each anonymous user the same cached page anyway. For authenticated users, the "active" class will be calculated on the client (through JavaScript), only data- attributes are added to list items and contained links, to prevent breaking the render cache. The JavaScript is added in system_page_attachments().
trans-unit.target: set_active_class：（可选）每个链接是否应将route_name + route_parameters或href（路径），语言和查询选项与当前URL进行比较，以确定该链接是否为“活动”。如果是这样，则“活动”类将应用于包含链接以及链接本身的列表项。一定要谨慎使用，因为它通常是不必要的，并且需要额外的处理。对于匿名用户，将在服务器上计算“活动”类，因为无论如何大多数站点都会为每个匿名用户提供相同的缓存页面。对于经过身份验证的用户，将在客户端上（通过JavaScript）计算“活动”类，仅将数据属性添加到列表项和包含的链接，以防止破坏渲染缓存。JavaScript已添加到system_page_attachments中（）。

trans-unit.source: standalone: (optional) Whether the live preview should stay in its own form element rather than in the suffix of the source element. Defaults to FALSE.
trans-unit.target: standalone：（可选）实时预览是否应保留在其自己的form元素中，而不是在source元素的后缀中。默认为FALSE。

trans-unit.source: start: The starting update that is to be processed. If this does not exist then do not process any updates for this module as there are other requirements that need to be resolved.
trans-unit.target: start：要处理的起始更新。如果不存在，则不要处理此模块的任何更新，因为还有其他要求需要解决。

trans-unit.source: state: State of the theme group, e.g. installed or uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: state：主题组的状态，例如已安装或已卸载。

trans-unit.source: statistics: An array of rows suitable for '#type' => 'table', containing performance statistics.
trans-unit.target: statistics：适用于'#type'=>'table'的行数组，包含性能统计信息。
